Live Music - Black River Harvestors
Start Time:
06:30 pm
End Time:
09:30 pm
End Date:
08/29/2025
Join us at Halpatter as we celebrate the arrival of the weekend! Join us at 7:30 as we welcome Clean Slate back to the the Garden Stage. Of course, we have all the best craft beer brewed right on site and a full menu of delicious food, too.

Burger 'n Beer Night
Start Time:
03:00 pm
End Time:
09:00 pm

Love a good burger? Then stop in every Wednesday for our Beer + Burger special.  Grab a delicious smash burger, fries or chips, and choice of one of our stellar core beers for only $18!
September
03
Line Dancing
Start Time:
06:30 pm
End Time:
07:30 pm
End Date:
09/03/2025
Get those boots on and get ready for weekly LINE DANCING! A teacher will be there to guide things along, so don't worry, everyone is welcome! $5 to participate.
September
04
Trivia Night
Start Time:
07:00 pm
End Time:
09:00 pm
End Date:
09/04/2025
Every Thursday is Taco & Trivia Time at Halpatter so gather up your nerdiest friends & head to the brewery to do a little thinking AND drinking! And don't miss out on the best tacos on the planet while you're here. Dates, times, and availability subject to change. Make sure to check our Social Media for the most up to date information.
